title: Motley Fool Money: 07.17.2009
description: Big banks rack up some big profits. Google's cloud rains on Twitter's parade. Wal-mart goes for the green. And Apple slaps Palm. In this installment of Motley Fool Money, we tackle those stories, share three stock ideas, and discuss the wisdom of Flannery O'Connor.
